dcterms:creator: H. Jiang
T. Shi
Z. Bai
L. Huang
dcterms:description: The LITS dataset contains 130 cases of tumors, metastases, and cysts, with CT scans that have large spatial resolution and field of view differences.
dcterms:title: LITS (Liver and Liver Tumor Segmentation)

dcterms:creator: Q. Huang
J. Sun
H. Ding
X. Wang
G. Wang
dcterms:description: The 3Dircadb dataset includes 20 patients with different image resolutions, vessel structures, intensity distributions, and liver vessel comparison CT enhancements.
dcterms:title: 3Dircadb (3D Image Reconstruction for Comparison of Algorithm Database)

dcterms:description: The LTBV dataset is a private dataset collected by the authors, containing annotated images of hepatic arterial vessels and liver tumors, but it is not publicly available due to patient privacy.
dcterms:title: LTBV (Liver Tumor Blood Vessel)
